column2: was  charged  in  the  Magistrate's  Court  of Wariyapola  for

column3: timber  in  a  vehicle  bearing  No.  57  - 0792  on  or  about  03.02.2012,  an  offence

column2: of Rs.20, 0001- with a default term of 6 months simple imprisonment.
